issue.title: www.chrisbenchetler.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.chrisbenchetler.com/mountains-of-the-moon](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chrisbenchetler.com%2Fmountains-of-the-moon) ### Comment > Guys - it's just a site flagged for phishing that shouldn't be. I understand the ways this can happen. The process you just made me go through to report it is arduous and a little bullshit. ``` Username: @jvyduna ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/2cj65lqn1j6sw8w4s8c8w0wscwwooow5ftoz74o8o0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/2678zrdkfnb44oowwck08w8k4kg8wcgizt29bh9n7s.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v5.2.800.16 System version: | `OSX 15.7.1` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | `None` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=mac&product_version=5.2.800.16&system_version=OSX+15.7.1&browser=chrome&filters=2&dns.enabled=false&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false)

issue.title: dexerto.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use?
